14 void MessageFilterBase<T>::inputCallback(T msg)
15 {
16  if(!this->buffer_)
17  {
18  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Buffer is not allocated!");
19  return;
20  }
21  this->buffer_->push_back(msg);
22  this->output_.publish(this->filter());
